definition: lit. to have one's hands bound and be unable to do anything about it (idiom); fig. helpless in the face of a crisis
surname Shu
to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less

policy/plan/scheme/bamboo slip for writing (old)/to whip (a horse)/to encourage/riding crop with sharp spines (old)/essay written for the imperial examinations (old)/upward horizontal stroke in calligraphy
surname Ce

sentences.english: To face the reality, we often do nothing, the flag to surrender.
sentences.chinese: 面對現實，我們常常束手無策，舉旗投降。

sentences.english: Modern Western medicine has had little impact in staying the disease's deadly hand.
sentences.chinese: 現代西醫技術對這種疾病的死亡之手基本束手無策。

sentences.english: But then the White House staff is several steps removed from a negotiating process.
sentences.chinese: 但白宮官員隨後卻在談判過程中感到了一些束手無策。

sentences.english: Q. Berdych was having some problem with your slice and change of speed.
sentences.chinese: 貝爾蒂奇對你的削球和速度變化束手無策。

sentences.english: Tne new code baffled the enemy agents.
sentences.chinese: 這套新密碼使敵特機關束手無策。

sentences.english: He lives only by his pen and could do nothing when running into a problem.
sentences.chinese: 他光會耍筆桿，碰到實際問題就束手無策。

sentences.english: The new code baffled the enemy agents.
sentences.chinese: 這套新密碼使敵特機關束手無策。

sentences.english: And anti-pollution measures and regulations are falling far short of getting to grips with it.
sentences.chinese: 而反污染措施及規章則鞭長莫及，束手無策。

sentences.english: And if the keypad is metal, fuhgeddaboudit.
sentences.chinese: 如果是金屬鍵盤，那就束手無策了。

sentences.english: His family members were at a loss, gathering around his bed and crying.
sentences.chinese: 子來的家人圍在牀的四周束手無策，大家哭成一團。

sentences.english: We don't have to feel stuck anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 我們不會在任何地方感到束手無策。

sentences.english: Like a new dog owner who's unsure what to do about her puppy barking all night.
sentences.chinese: 新主人因爲狗狗整夜叫個不停而束手無策。

sentences.english: and they do not know how to fix the tire.
sentences.chinese: 而車上的人對此束手無策。

sentences.english: But many small and middle starch factories have no idea of washing the screening surface.
sentences.chinese: 但多數中小型澱粉廠對篩面的清洗束手無策。

definition: deeply worried and sick at heart (idiom)
hard to understand/incomprehensible
to watch with folded arms (idiom); to look on without lifting a finger
to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat/measure for measure
no strategy left to try (idiom); at one's wit's end/at the end of one's tether/powerless
not knowing which course to follow (idiom); at a loss what to do
to remain unmoved
to no avail/of no use
(saying) to be very scared and on edge
safety issue/security issue
unusual condition/something odd/strange shape
you can't guard against it (idiom)/impossible to defend effectively/not much one can do about it/It can't be prevented.
to assert/assertion
warning sign/police call
to submit to humiliation (idiom); to suffer in silence/to swallow one's anger/to grin and bear it
a common occurrence (idiom)
